page.title: 06THE MARINA
page.content:
The{West View Marina}is situated on the south side of{Earith}on the{River {Ouse.}It deals with{boats}mainly ,but has a shop which ranges from groceries to an off licence.It has all kinds of boats which they{hire}and{moor}there. It also has a garage for{repairing {boats.}It is the second of the two marinas in Earith.It also has a{Camp {site}for holiday-makers viewing the Great Ouse.It employs several full time and part time staff,which are mostly for cleaning and preparing the boats ready for hiring.
(By Andrew and Nathan aged 11 years)
